metadata.title: CVE-2022-41850 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: roccat_report_event in drivers/hid/hid-roccat.c in the Linux kernel through5.19.12 has a race condition and resultant use-after-free in certainsituations where a report is received while copying a report->value is inprogress.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
